attributes.action: stop the Premier league being taken abroad, for the sake of the real fans who are already mis treated by the t.v companies who constantly change kick off times.  Now to change the kick off time and country!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not only are us real football fans messed around by the t.v compaines changing the kick off times now we are going to have to deal with the venue being changed as well.  And you know that the kick off time for the UK will be some silly time on a weekday morning.  Not to mention the unfairness of the 39th game.  Who will play who.  Will your team have to play manchester untied 3 times in a season..if so why don't you get to see it!?  Sign this petition to stop this madness!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
